name: 黃柏鈞
objective:
本課程介紹常用的基礎資料結構。請注意本課程以中英語混和授課。

This course introduces fundamental data structures. Please note that this course is given in a mixture of Mandarin Chinese and English.
schedule:
第 1 週 概論：時／空間效率分析與漸進式符號
第 2 週 一維與多維陣列（矩陣）、堆疊、佇列、雙向佇列、環狀佇列
第 3 週 最小與最大堆積、費氏堆積
第 4 週 單向鏈結串列、雙向鏈結串列、環狀鏈結串列、XOR 鏈結串列、省略串列
※ 第 5 週 第一次小考
第 6 週 二元搜尋樹、AVL 樹、伸張樹
第 7 週 2-3 樹、2-3-4 樹
第 8 週 紅黑樹
※ 第 9 週 期中考
第 10 週 B - 樹及 B+- 樹
第 11 週 替罪羔羊樹、堆積樹 (treap)、vEB 樹
第 12 週 雜湊表、綻放過濾器
※ 第 13 週 第二次小考
第 14 週 無向圖、有向圖、先深搜尋 (DFS)、先寬搜尋 (BFS)
第 15 週 最短路徑演算法
第 16 週 伸展樹 (spanning tree)
第 17 週 總複習
※ 第 18 週 期末考

Week 1. Overview: analysis of time--space efficiency and asymptotic notations
Week 2. One-dimensional and multi-dimensional arrays, stack, queue, double-ended queue (deque), and circular queue
Week 3. Min and max heaps, and Fibonacci heap
Week 4. Singly and doubly linked lists, circular linked list, XOR linked list, and skip list
※ Week 5. Quiz 1
Week 6. Binary search tree (BST), AVL tree, and splay tree
Week 7. 2-3 tree and 2-3-4 tree
Week 8. Red-black tree
※ Week 9. Midterm examination
Week 10. B-tree and B+-tree
Week 11. Scapegoat tree, treap, and van Emde Boas (vEB) tree
Week 12. Hash table and bloom filter
※ Week 13. Quiz 2
Week 14. Undirected graphs, directed graphs, depth-first search (DFS), and breadth-first search (BFS)
Week 15. Shortest path algorithms
Week 16. Spanning trees
Week 17. Review
※ Week 18. Final examination
scorePolicy:
※ 期中考 30%
※ 期末考 30%
※ 小考 20%
※ 作業與課堂參與 20%

※ Midterm examination: 30%
※ Final examination: 30%
※ Quizzes: 20%, 10% each
※ Homework assignments and in-class participation: 20%
materials:
Textbook (mandatory)
※ Thomas Cormen et al., Introduction to Algorithm, 3rd edition, MIT Press, 2009.

References (optional)
※ Erik Demaine, MIT Course 6.851 "Advanced Data Structures," 2012. Available at: https://courses.csail.mit.edu/6.851/spring12/scribe/2012scribes.pdf
※ Sukhamay Kundu, Advanced Data-structures & Algorithm Analysis, 2011. Available at: https://www.csc.lsu.edu/~kundu/dstr/notes.html
※ Gerth Stolting Brodal, Advanced Algorithms - Data Structures, 2011. Available at: http://tildeweb.au.dk/au121/aa11/
